content:
EDUCATION 
 

 

B. Sc. (Hons)  in Information Technology, University of Moratuwa   
    Overall GPA (Up to level 3) - 3.75 
 

GCE Advanced Level (2013), Anula Vidyalaya, Nugegoda 
    Chemistry-A, Physics-B, Combined Maths-B 
 
GCE Ordinary Level (2008),  Pannala Maha Vidyalaya, Ampagala 
    7 A Passes, 1 B Pass and 1 C Pass 

 PROFESSIONAL QUALIFICATIONS 
 

 

Diploma in Information Technology with E-commerce at ESOFT   
(September, 2012 – December, 2012) 

 WORK EXPERIENCE 

 
 

Trainee Software Engineer at Zillione Business Solutions Pvt. Ltd 
(September, 2017 – March, 2018) 
Full stack developer, AngularJS, C#, ASP.NET, Visual Studio, VS code, Postman,   
Entity Framework, MSSQL 
 

Trainee Banker at People’s Bank, Ruwanwella Branch  
(January, 2014 – December, 2014) 

 AWARDS AND ARCHIEVEMENTS 

 
 

Listed in the Dean’s List  
    Level 2 Semester 2 - 3.86 
    Level 3 Semester 1 - 3.98 
 
Participated IEEE Extreme Programming Competition 10.0  
    Island Rank: 231 

 PROJECTS 
 

Total Car Park Solution(Ongoing) 
Final year research based project which is helping to automated car park activities. 
This project consists mainly four modules as vehicle license plate detection, skew 
correction and character segmentation, character recognition and multi camera 
vehicle tracking. 
Technologies: OpenCV, Python, Machine learning, Pycharm 

 

Dynamic Admin Module(September,2017 to February,2018) 
Individual project done in internship period which is to handle all admin related 
functionalities. Functionalities are handled dynamically as module can be integrated 
with new projects easily. 
Tools & Technologies: AngularJS, C#, ASP.NET, Visual Studio, VS code, 

Postman, Entity Framework, MSSQL, Javascipt 

 

Independent Study on Machine Learning Techniques for Customer Churn 

Prediction (May,2017 to August,2017) 
Individual research done under the level 3 course module ‘Independent Study’ 
which evaluated the machine learning techniques for customer churn prediction in 
telecommunication industry. 
 

E-harvest Web Application (April,2016 to February,2017) 
This was completed as level 2 group project. This is a web based system which 
enable farmers and buyers to connect directly to buying and selling process. The 
project was mentored by We Are Designers Pvt. Ltd. 
Technologies: Laravel, PHP,  MYSQL, Bootstrap, JavaScript  

 

Automatic Sketch Drawing Rover(March,2015 to March, 2016)  
Hardware based group project completed in level 1.   This is micro-controller based 
device which draws       Sketches automatically according to the user inputs.   User 
inputs are handled using an android app and Bluetooth communication 
Technologies: AT mega 32 micro-controller, C Language, Android 

 

 

Nimesha Rathnayake                                                                    09/10/2018 

ABOUT ME 

I am an enthusiastic, hardworking and responsible 

fresh graduate with four years of academic 

experience in Information Technology. I am seeking 

for opportunity as a software engineer where I can 

utilize my knowledge and skills, while contributing 

to the organization to achieve its success and goals. 

Also I am a good team player and passionate about 

exploring and learning emerging technologies.
